message: Let's split the money 60/40.  I think this is a fair offer that allows us both to benefit.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about a 55/45 split instead?  It's still a win-win, but a little more balanced.
Bob, it's clear we both want a larger share, but letting this drag on only hurts us both. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we get the most out of this deal.
